import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { login } from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') return (

Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)} > password setPassword(e.target.value)} >
New Customer? Register ) } export default LoginScreen
